faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Answers to frequently asked questions. Use search to filter.

0.question: What are the deadlines for creating a website?
0.answer: A complete showcase site is delivered in 7 to 10 days maximum, depending on responsiveness to validate content (texts, photos, logo). The process is fast and structured to avoid delays.

1.question: What content should I provide?
1.answer: Ideally: your logo, some photos of your work, the list of your services, your contact details. If you don't have everything, I can provide optimized texts and royalty-free images.

2.question: Do I need to manage hosting and domain name?
2.answer: No, I take care of everything. I help you reserve a domain name in your name and set up reliable hosting. You own the site and keep full access.

3.question: Will the site be visible on Google?
3.answer: Yes. Each site is delivered optimized for local SEO: clear structure, SEO tags, speed and mobile compatibility. Additionally, I can create or improve your Google Business Profile to strengthen your local visibility.

4.question: Can I update my site myself?
4.answer: Yes. The site is designed to be simple to modify. I provide you with admin access and mini-training to make basic changes (text, photos, prices).

5.question: Do you offer follow-up after launch?
5.answer: Yes. A monthly maintenance option is available (â‚¬30/month): technical updates, backups, security and small modifications. This allows you to have a site that's always up to date and secure.

6.question: How does payment work?
6.answer: Payment is simple and transparent: 30% deposit at start, balance on delivery. You can also pay in 2 installments without fees. No hidden costs.

7.question: What happens if I've never had a website?
7.answer: It's common, and I take care of everything: domain reservation, hosting, site creation, email configuration if needed. You leave with a turnkey solution, ready to generate clients.
